mapper.sql: PKID, CASE_CODE, EVA_CODE, INVOICE_TYPE, INVOICE_HEADER, INVOICE_AMOUNT, INVOICE_ADDRESS, STATUS, TAX_NUM, APPLY_DATE, TO_FINSH_DATE, BANK_OPENED_DATE, BANK_ACCOUNT, BILL_TIME, EVA_PROCESS_ID,EVA_POINTER,OPEN_ACCOUNT_BANK,COLLECT_TIME,COLLECT_PERSON
mapper.select:
select
from sctrans.T_TO_EVA_INVOICE where CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND EVA_POINTER = 1

SELECT I.PKID,I.CASE_CODE,I.EVA_CODE,I.INVOICE_HEADER,I.INVOICE_AMOUNT,I.INVOICE_ADDRESS,I.APPLY_DATE,I.INVOICE_TYPE,F.FIN_ORG_NAME,E.FIN_ORG_ID FROM [sctrans].[T_TO_EVA_INVOICE] AS I LEFT JOIN [sctrans].[T_TO_EVA_REPORT_PROCESS] AS E ON I.CASE_CODE=E.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN [sctrans].[T_TS_FIN_ORG] AS F ON E.FIN_ORG_ID=F.FIN_ORG_CODE WHERE I.CASE_CODE=#{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into sctrans.T_TO_EVA_INVOICE (PKID, CASE_CODE, EVA_CODE, INVOICE_TYPE, INVOICE_HEADER, INVOICE_AMOUNT, INVOICE_ADDRESS, STATUS, TAX_NUM, APPLY_DATE, TO_FINSH_DATE, BANK_OPENED_DATE, BANK_ACCOUNT, BILL_TIME, EVA_PROCESS_ID ) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{evaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{invoiceHeader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{invoiceAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{invoiceAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{taxNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{toFinshDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bankOpenedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{evaProcessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update sctrans.T_TO_EVA_INVOICE
CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EVA_CODE = #{evaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVOICE_TYPE = #{invoiceType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
INVOICE_HEADER = #{invoiceHeader,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INVOICE_AMOUNT = #{invoiceAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INVOICE_ADDRESS = #{invoiceAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
TAX_NUM = #{taxNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLY_DATE = #{applyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TO_FINSH_DATE = #{toFinshDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BANK_OPENED_DATE = #{bankOpenedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
BANK_ACCOUNT = #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BILL_TIME = #{billTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EVA_PROCESS_ID = #{evaProcessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPEN_ACCOUNT_BANK = #{openAccountBank,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
COLLECT_TIME=#{collectTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COLLECT_PERSON= #{collectPerson,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sctrans.T_TO_EVA_INVOICE set CASE_CODE = #{caseCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EVA_CODE = #{evaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INVOICE_TYPE = #{invoiceType,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, INVOICE_HEADER = #{invoiceHeader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INVOICE_AMOUNT = #{invoiceAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INVOICE_ADDRESS = #{invoiceAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, TAX_NUM = #{taxNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLY_DATE = #{applyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TO_FINSH_DATE = #{toFinshDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BANK_OPENED_DATE = #{bankOpenedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BANK_ACCOUNT = #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILL_TIME = #{billTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EVA_PROCESS_ID = #{evaProcessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PKID = #{pkid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
